info.name: Ticketeer API Collection
info.description:
Comprehensive API documentation for the Ticketeer ticket sales management system. This collection includes authentication methods, request/response examples, and detailed parameter documentation for all endpoints.

## Authentication
Most endpoints require Auth0 JWT authentication. Include a valid JWT token in the Authorization header as Bearer token.

## Base URL
`http://localhost:3000` (development)

## Last Updated
September 10, 2025 - v1.0.0

## Features Covered
- Health Check & Test Endpoints
- Event Management (CRUD)
- Ticket Management (CRUD)
- Batch Operations
- Statistics & Analytics

request.description:
Create a new event. The authenticated user becomes the owner of the event.

**Required Fields:**
- title (string): Event name/title
- date (ISO string): Event date and time
- venue (string): Event location/venue

**Optional Fields:**
- description (string): Event description
- price (number): Base price (defaults to 0)
